articles.author: Matt Stopera
articles.title: I'm NGL When I Say It's Pretty Surprising To See How Old These 70 Celebrities Were In The Year 2000
articles.description: Growing up in the early 2000s everyone felt so much older than us, so it's weird to look back at how old everyone actually was. It's just so weird to me that Reese Witherspoon was only 24 when she was in Legally Blonde, and Britney Spears was only 19 when she…

articles.author: Crystal Ro
articles.title: People Are Talking About The Saddest Songs They've Ever Heard, And It's A Sobering List
articles.description: "When I hear 'Time in a Bottle,' all I think about is Jim Croce leaving behind his little boy. I still like the song and appreciate it, but it makes me sad every time I hear it."

articles.author: Allie Hayes
articles.title: 15 Little Easter Eggs And Details In Horror Movies That Are Scary Clever
articles.description: "In The Ring the tree with fiery red leaves is a Japanese maple. The fruit that this tree produces is called a 'samara.' The name of the movie’s antagonist is Samara Morgan."

articles.author: Kelly Martinez
articles.title: People Are Sharing The Cities That Movies And TV Shows Never Portray Accurately, And It's Eye-Opening
articles.description: "A lot of people go to Paris the same way they might go to Disneyland — they're expecting a curated vacation experience. It's easy to treat it as an open museum. But Paris is a city, and millions of people live and work there."

articles.author: Ryan Schocket
articles.title: Gen Z'ers Are Sharing What They Dislike About Their Generation, And They Didn't Hold Back
articles.description: "We're armchair therapists and social justice warriors with the inability to be open minded."

articles.author: Fabiana Buontempo
articles.title: 12 Times Celebrities Frivolously Spent Money, And I'm Shaking My Head At A Lot Of These
articles.description: Tom Cruise bought Katie Holmes a private jet for $20 million as a wedding gift. A source said that Tom wanted "something that would make her life so much better than a big diamond on her finger.
